name: Air Thunder
description:
Hey, this was my first try to take part in a Game Jam. Sadly, I got Covid-19 while working on Air Thunder and had to extend my deadline by three days.

So this is my entry for my own
2½ Weeks - (got sick while working on it) - Game Jam!

Full-screen is toggleable via the Pause Menu.

Playing with a Gamepad is advised.

Things that I want to add/change in the future:

  • Better camera controls
  • A map or something for better navigation
  • Improved crash-physics
  • A tutorial
  • Full Gamepad control in the menu
